metadata.Title: CVE-2023-20898 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Git Providers can read from the wrong environment because they get the samecache directory base name in Salt masters prior to 3005.2 or 3006.2.Anything that uses Git Providers with different environments can getgarbage data or the wrong data, which can lead to wrongful data disclosure,wrongful executions, data corruption and/or crash.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
